de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers

Interface Visualization

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOPTICSVisualization, AbstractTooltipVisualization, AbstractVisualization, AxisVisualization, BubbleVisualization, ClusterConvexHullVisualization, ClusteringVisualization, ClusterMeanVisualization, ClusterOrderVisualization, DotVisualization, EMClusterVisualization, MoveObjectsToolVisualization, OPTICSClusterVisualization, OPTICSPlotCutVisualization, OPTICSPlotSelectionVisualization, OPTICSPlotVisualizer, OPTICSSteepAreaVisualization, P1DHistogramVisualizer, P1DVisualization, P2DVisualization, PixmapVisualizer, PolygonVisualization, ReferencePointsVisualization, SelectionConvexHullVisualization, SelectionCubeVisualization, SelectionDotVisualization, SelectionToolCubeVisualization, SelectionToolDotVisualization, SimilarityMatrixVisualizer, StaticVisualization, ThumbnailVisualization, ToolBox2DVisualization, TooltipScoreVisualization, TooltipStringVisualization, TreeMBRVisualization, TreeSphereVisualization

    public interface Visualization
    Base class for a materialized Visualization.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Destroy the visualization.
      Element getLayer()
      Get the SVG layer of the given visualization.

    • Method Detail

      • getLayer

        Element getLayer()
        Get the SVG layer of the given visualization.
        Returns:
        layer

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroy the visualization. Called after the elements have been removed from the document. Implementations should remove their listeners etc.
